price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: “Sε moahunu, sε (Qur’aan yi)) firi Nyankopͻn hͻ na monnye nnie a, hwan na ͻwͻ yera mu kyεn obia ͻko tia (nokorε, na saa nipa no ayera kͻ) akyirikyiri? “
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ كَفَرۡتُم بِهِۦ مَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِمَّنۡ هُوَ فِي شِقَاقِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in kāna min ʿindi al-lahi thumma kafartum bihi man aḍallu mimman huwa fī shiqāqin baʿīdin
